blog.title: Hello World
blog.description: I welcome you to my personal blog exploring technology, blockchain, and creative coding. Expect insights on modern web development, decentralized systems, and innovative digital experiences.

nextBlog.title: Ideas behind the blog stack
nextBlog.description: I share my journey from scattered notes to a unified blog using React and Vike. Modern web tech offers speed, simplicity, and full version control over traditional solutions.
